Package org.neo4j.internal.kernel.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AutoCloseablePlus
    Enriches AutoCloseable with isClosed().
    CloseListener
    A listener to close events of AutoCloseablePlus instances.
    Cursor
    This interface should not be used generically in hot paths, but instead these use cases should use the explicit cursor types.
    CursorFactory
    Allocates Cursors.
    ExecutionStatistics
    Expose statistical information about the current transaction.
    IndexReadSession
    Token which represents a read session towards a specific index.
    IndexResultScore
    An index result, typically in the form of a cursor, that can have a score for how well the current or given result matches the query.
    KernelReadTracer
    Tracer of kernel API reads.
    Locks
    Methods for acquiring and releasing locks.
    NodeCursor
    Cursor for scanning nodes.
    NodeIndexCursor
    Cursor for scanning the nodes of a schema index.
    NodeLabelIndexCursor
    Cursor for scanning the nodes of a label index.
    NodeValueIndexCursor
    Cursor for scanning the property values of nodes in a schema index.
    PopulationProgress  
    Procedures  
    PropertyCursor
    Cursor for scanning the properties of a node or relationship.
    QueryContext
    Represents the specific transactional context in which an index query is executed.
    Read
    Defines the graph read operations of the Kernel.
    RelationshipDataAccessor
    Surface for accessing relationship data.
    RelationshipIndexCursor
    Cursor for scanning relationships of a schema index.
    RelationshipScanCursor
    Cursor for scanning relationships, that is listing relationships without grouping by source or target node.
    RelationshipTraversalCursor
    Cursor for traversing the relationships of a single node.
    RelationshipTypeIndexCursor
    Cursor for scanning relationships of a relationship type index.
    Scan<Cursor extends Cursor>
    Initializer for spreading a scan operator over multiple cursors for use from different threads in parallel.
    SchemaRead
    Surface for getting schema information, such as fetching specific indexes or constraints.
    SchemaReadCore
    The reduced core set of schema read methods
    SchemaWrite
    Surface for creating and dropping indexes and constraints.
    Token
    Token creation and lookup.
    TokenRead  
    TokenSet
    Set of token ids.
    TokenWrite  
    Write
    Defines the write operations of the Kernel API.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultCloseListenable  
    DoNothingCloseListenable  
    IndexQuery  
    IndexQuery.ExactPredicate  
    IndexQuery.ExistsPredicate  
    IndexQuery.FulltextSearchPredicate  
    IndexQuery.GeometryRangePredicate  
    IndexQuery.RangePredicate<T extends Value>  
    IndexQuery.StringContainsPredicate  
    IndexQuery.StringPredicate  
    IndexQuery.StringPrefixPredicate  
    IndexQuery.StringSuffixPredicate  
    IndexQuery.TextRangePredicate  
    IndexQueryConstraints  
    NodeValueIndexCursor.Empty  
    NumberRangePredicate  
    PopulationProgress.MultiBuilder  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IndexQuery.IndexQueryType  
    InternalIndexState
    Defines the state of a given index.
